Variable.name: hatch_mom_Ring
Variable.description: Unique alpha numeric code on the aluminimum ring (band) fitted to the leg of the adult female attending to the nest in which the chick hatched. This female can be assumed to have laid the eggs in this nest and thus to be the mother of this chick.

Variable.name: hatch_nest_LD
Variable.description: The date of the first egg was laid ('lay date') in the clutch from which the chick hatched. 1 = April 1.

Variable.name: hatch_nest_CS
Variable.description: The size of the clutch (number of eggs) from which the chick hatched.

Variable.name: rear_nest_breed_ID
Variable.description: Unique numeric code corresponding to the brood of chick with which this row's chick was reared. Each time a single clutch of eggs were laid in a given nest box, that clutch was assigned a breeding ID.

Variable.name: rear_area
Variable.description: Letter code corresponding to the area (a.k.a. 'compartment') of the study site in which the chick was reared

Variable.name: rear_Box
Variable.description: Alpha numeric code corresponding to the individual nest box in which the chick was reared. The code consists of the area code followed by the number of the nest box within that area.

Variable.name: rear_mom_Ring
Variable.description: Unique alpha numeric code on the aluminimum ring (band) fitted to the leg of the adult female attending to the nest in which the chick was reared.

Variable.name: rear_dad_Ring
Variable.description: Unique alpha numeric code on the aluminimum ring (band) fitted to the leg of the adult male attending to the nest in which the chick was reared.

Variable.name: rear_nest_trt
Variable.description: Nest experimental manipulation treatment code for the nest in which the chick was reared. '5' indicates a net increase in the number of chicks (brood size increased), '6' indicates a net decrease in the number of chicks (brood size decreased), '7' indicates no manipulation (no chicks added or removed).

Variable.name: home_or_away
Variable.description: Indicates whether the chick was reared in the nest in which it hatched or had been moved by an experimenter to another nest. 1 = home (reared in nest of hatching); 2 = away (reared in transplanted nest)

Variable.name: net_rearing_manipulation
Variable.description: Net change in chick number in nest where chick reared

Variable.name: rear_Cs_at_start_of_rearing
Variable.description: Number of chicks in nest of rearing immediately following experimental chick removals and additions

Variable.name: d14_rear_nest_brood_size
Variable.description: In the nest where the chick was reared, the number of live chicks in the nest at day 14 after hatching

Variable.name: number_chicks_fledged_from_rear_nest
Variable.description: In the nest where the chick was reared, the number of chicks that survived to leave the nest

Variable.name: day_14_tarsus_length
Variable.description: Length of chick tarsometatarus in mm at day 14 after hatching

Variable.name: day_14_weight
Variable.description: mass of chick in grams at day 14 after hatching

Variable.name: chick_sex_molec
Variable.description: Sex of the chick based on molecular genetic analysis. 1 = female; 2 = male.  Not all chicks were sexed.

Variable.name: chick_survival_to_first_breed_season
Variable.description: Indicates whether the chick was documented as attempting to breed on the study site in any subsequent year
